title: BRIEF-Ormat Technologies, Inc. Announces The Closing Of $100 Million Debt Financing
text: March 27, 2018 / 11:58 AM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Ormat Technologies, Inc. Announces The Closing Of $100 Million Debt Financing Reuters Staff March 27 (Reuters) - Ormat Technologies Inc: * ORMAT TECHNOLOGIES, INC. ANNOUNCES THE CLOSING OF $100 MILLION DEBT FINANCING * ORMAT TECHNOLOGIES - ENTERS LOAN AGREEMENT WITH AFFILIATES OF ISRAELâ€™S MIGDAL GROUP TO PROVIDE CO WITH A $100.0 MILLION SENIOR UNSECURED LOAN Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
